title: Graphic Design
description: Explore the principles of design and learn to create stunning visual content.
learning_outcomes: Master tools like Photoshop and Illustrator.
Create professional-level designs for various media.

instructor.name: Sophia Davis
instructor.experience: 10+ years in graphic design and branding

reviews.comment: Great introduction to design. The practical projects were fantastic!
Loved the course, but more advanced topics would be nice.

title: Web Development
description: Learn to build modern and responsive websites from scratch.
learning_outcomes: Understand HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals.
Build responsive websites using modern frameworks.
Deploy websites and manage hosting services.

instructor.name: David Lee
instructor.experience: Full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience

reviews.comment: Excellent course! It gave me the confidence to start freelancing.
Good mix of theory and practice. The live sessions were very engaging.

title: App Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of mobile app development with this comprehensive course.
learning_outcomes: Learn how to deploy apps to app stores.

reviews.comment: Great course for beginners! The practical examples were very helpful.
Well-structured content but could use more advanced topics.

title: Data Science
description: Master data analysis and machine learning techniques to analyze large datasets.
learning_outcomes: Analyze and visualize data using Python and R.
Apply machine learning models to real-world problems.
Understand big data tools like Hadoop and Spark.

instructor.name: Dr. Emily Chen
instructor.experience: PhD in Data Science, 15+ years in analytics

reviews.comment: Comprehensive and detailed. Helped me land a data analyst role!

title: Digital Marketing
description: Learn the strategies behind successful digital marketing campaigns.
learning_outcomes: Create and optimize social media campaigns.
Analyze marketing performance using analytics tools.

reviews.comment: Perfect for beginners. I launched my first campaign successfully!
Good course, but could use more examples from different industries.

title: Ethical Hacking
description: Understand the world of cybersecurity and ethical hacking with real-world examples.
learning_outcomes: Learn to identify and exploit vulnerabilities.
Master the tools used by ethical hackers.

instructor.name: Kevin Smith
instructor.experience: Certified Ethical Hacker with 12+ years in cybersecurity

reviews.comment: Highly informative and hands-on! The labs were excellent.
Challenging course, but it really enhanced my skills.
